tool_description: The Voice RSS Text-to-Speech (TTS) API allows conversion of textual content to speech easier than ever. Just connect to our Text-to-Speech (TTS) API with a few lines of code and get verbal representation of a textual content.
name: Text-to-Speech
title: Text-to-Speech

api_list.name: Convert text to speech via HTTP POST
api_list.description: Converts textual content to audio content

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: The textual content for converting to speech

parameters.name: r
parameters.description: The speech rate (speed). Allows values: from -10 (slowest speed) up to 10 (fastest speed). Default value: 0 (normal speed)

utterances.utterance: Convert the text 'Good morning, everyone!' to speech in English.
Turn the text 'Buenos días' into speech in Spanish.
Convert 'Bonjour, comment ça va?' to speech in French with a slow speed.
Transform the text 'Guten Morgen' into speech in German with a fast speed.
Convert 'Ciao, come stai?' to speech in Italian using the WAV audio format.
Turn the text 'Olá, tudo bem?' into speech in Portuguese with a normal speed.
Convert 'こんにちは' to speech in Japanese with a slow speed and MP3 format.
Transform the text '안녕하세요' into speech in Korean with a fast speed.
Convert 'Hallo, wie geht es dir?' to speech in German with a normal speed and 16kHz audio format.
Turn the text 'Hej, hur mår du?' into speech in Swedish with a slow speed and OGG format.
